backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and scam report creation with access control and query functions for retrieving reports and profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to add the 1930 cybercrime helpline to help content, including affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files, describing their roles in routing, UI layout, scam reporting, resources, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx and provides the root mount container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with all main routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting first‑time users to enter a name and save their profile using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper providing top navigation, routed content, and a footer with attribution and disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Responsive top navigation bar handling route links, Internet Identity login/logout, profile display, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/resources/Resour: Accordion-based resources card describing evidence collection, safe bank contact steps, and highlighted 1930 reporting info.
frontend/src/components/scam-reports/Sca: Form component allowing users to submit scam reports with type, title, description, and optional loss amount.
Displays scam reports filtered by type with loading, error, and empty states.
Provides tab-based UI for selecting scam type filters.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, updating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and providing login/logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useScamReports.ts: Hooks to fetch all reports, fetch reports by type, and create new scam reports via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and update the caller’s user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color palettes, themes, and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Authentication page using Internet Identity that handles login/logout, displays user info, and shows profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/pages/HelpHowToHelpPage.tsx: Guidance page outlining immediate steps to take after being scammed, with structured cards and checklists.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring hero content, safety education messaging, and links to guidance and scam reports.
frontend/src/pages/ScamGuidancePage.tsx: Detailed scam education page defining multiple scam types with descriptions, details, and prevention steps.
frontend/src/pages/ScamReportsPage.tsx: Community scam reports page enabling report submission, filtering, and browsing, with authentication checks.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting timestamps into human-readable dates and loss amounts into USD strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, features, architecture notes, and metadata for the cyber‑guidance website.
